Paint++

A simple paint application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScrip. It explores mathematical formulas to control pixel drawing and brush behavior.

GitHub

MusicLector

A musician's windows app to organize PDF scores, manage order, read them, and make annotations. It features a simple interface with a focus on usability. Check the Github Release for more details.

GitHub

Osiris

Planting Management System. A web application to manage planting tasks, crops, and resources. It features a user-friendly interface with a focus on usability. its like a simple ERP for small farms.
